title: kuzhandaip-paruvam
sahitya:
kuzhandaip-paruvam pazhanippadi enrAl kuzhaindiDum en uLLam kumarA nI ariyAyO


anupallavi

  pazham tamizh pOTrum pAdA paDai vIDAruLLa nAthA azhagu deivamE pErAnanda nilaiyamE


caraNam    endap-padi shonnAlum enda deivam enrAlum anda iDattum un pEr anri nAn shonnaduNDO 
annaiyin mun ninrAlum unnaiyE kATTugenbEn anaittum arinda guhA aruLODu vArAyO
